fields.infoText: Your trader identification number is the same as your Economic Operator Registration and Identification (EORI) number

fields.label: Why am I being asked for this?
fields.infoText: We use your EORI number to link together all 7 forms for your application

fields.label: EORI Number
Member states country codes
fields.infoText:
Find the required [member state country codes](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/uk-trade-tariff-country-and-currency-codes/uk-trade-tariff-country-and-currency-codes#a "Member state country codes") here 

 You will need to press back in your browser to get back to this form

fields.helpText: Enter your country code, for example GB, followed by your 12 numerical digit EORI number
fields.errorMessage: Input your country code and EORI number

sections.title: Information and statistics on customs matters (1.3.1)

fields.label: Do you perform customs formalities in your own name and for your own account?

sections.title: Information and statistics on customs matters

fields.label: Is someone representing you regarding customs formalities?

sections.title: Information and statistics on customs matters

fields.infoText:
If 'Yes', by whom and how (directly or indirectly)?

 Include the name, address and EORI number of the representative

sections.title: Information and statistics on customs matters

fields.label: Do you represent other persons in customs formalities?

fields.infoText:
Who do you represent (Name the most significant clients)?

 How do you represent them (directly or indirectly)?

fields.label: How, and by whom, is the tariff classification of goods decided?
What quality assurance measures do you take to make sure that tariff classifications are correct (for example, checks, plausibility checks, internal working instructions, regular training)?
Do you keep notes on these quality assurance measures?
fields.shortName: Notes kept on quality assurance measures (1.3.2c)

fields.label: Do you regularly monitor the effectiveness of your quality assurance measures?
What resources do you use for tariff classification (for example, database of standing data on goods)?
How and by whom is the customs value established?
fields.shortName: How and by whom, the customs value is established (1.3.3a)

fields.label: What quality assurance measures do you take to make sure that the customs value is correctly established (for example, checks, plausibility checks, internal working instructions, regular training, other means)?
Do you regularly monitor the effectiveness of your quality assurance measures?
Do you keep notes on these quality assurance measures?
fields.shortName: Notes on quality assurance measures kept (1.3.3d)

fields.label: Give an overview of the preferential or non-preferential origin of the imported goods. If none, state N/A

sections.title: Origin of imported goods internal actions

fields.label: What internal actions have you implemented to verify that the country of origin of the imported goods is declared correctly? If none, state N/A

sections.title: Origin of imported goods issuing of proof
sections.shortName: Imported goods issuing of proofs of origins

fields.label: Describe your approach in the issuing of proof of preferences and certificates of origin for exportation. If none, state N/A

sections.title: Goods subject to anti-dumping duties or countervailing duties?

fields.label: Do you deal in goods subject to anti-dumping duties or countervailing duties?

sections.title: Goods subject to anti-dumping duties or countervailing duties?
sections.shortName: Anti-dumping duties or countervailing duties details

fields.label: Provide details of the manufacturer(s) or countries outside the EU whose goods are subject to anti-dumping duties or countervailing duties
fields.shortName: Details of anti-dumping or countervailing duties

fields.label: Provide details below of who is signing the declaration
First name
fields.errorMessage: First name can only include letters a to z, numbers, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

fields.label: Last name
fields.errorMessage: Last name can only include letters a to z, numbers, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

fields.label: Status
fields.helpText: For example, director, financial controller or secretary
fields.errorMessage: Position in the company can only include letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

fields.label: To receive confirmation that your return has been submitted, enter an email address below
Email address
fields.errorMessage: Enter a valid email address with no spaces, like name@example.com

fields.infoText: This is your last opportunity to print or save a pdf copy of your submitted form.
